name: Colorless (saviorium, Jeinara, sasha9843)
description:
The game is about a girl's attempts to get herself together in a collapsing world.

Code and graphics by:

saviorium, sawa9889, Jeinara

Music by saviorium

Everything was done within two weeks for LOWREZJAM 2020

Special thanks to our writer: @LunaticPuppet

Source code

Changelog:

1.0.0 - jam version

1.1.0  - post-jam:
- stability fixes
- fixed levels
- added images for storytelling

Controlls:

WASD to control your character
F - interact with objects
Q - switch active layer/color
R - restart level
M - mute sound
1-5 - screen size

Libraries used:

LÖVE 11.3
hump - for classes, gamestates, vectors
peachy - for animations
HC - collision library

Assets used:

Sounds from https://www.bfxr.net/
Fonts: self-made font inspired by https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
